How to Stay Focused While Programming: Top Strategies

In the fast-paced world of software development, efficiency and focus are paramount. Microtasking, a strategy that breaks down larger tasks into smaller, manageable units, has emerged as a powerful technique to enhance productivity and streamline workflow. Here’s how microtasking can benefit developers

Bridging the Skill Gap in Kenya: Challenges and Solutions

Kenya, a growing center of innovation and tech in East Africa, has an important challenge: the skill gap. This gap between what employers need and what job seekers have is a big hurdle for economic growth. Bridging this gap is key to unlocking the potential of Kenya’s youth and ensuring long-term economic progress.

My Latest Projects

I've worked on a variety of projects, from simple websites to complex web applications. Here are a few of my latest.

CLI ChatBot
A command-line interface chatbot for interactive user interactions.
Bizna Dashboard
A dashboard application for managing business analytics and insights from their clients while selling digital goods conveniently.
Tees & Stuffs
An e-commerce store specializing in selling T-shirts and related merchandise. Built with NextJs, Shadcn, Prisma, MongoDB, and NextAuth.
Annuar Ndung'u
This is a custom made portfolio built using next, framer, shadcn and tailwind
BrightSpend Landing Page
The landing page for BrightSpend, an AI-powered financial education platform built with material tailwind, react and zustand for state management.
